long_description:
FINALLY, after a long amount of teasing on the Luanti Discord - I've finally gone through with uploading this!

Change the notes by right clicking the sides - right click the bass clef for lower, treble clef for higher. Punch to play the notes!

Example of all the instruments in MTG: https://files.catbox.moe/fb7xio.mp4


Modding (remind me to add an API tag when I do) and translations are not available just yet - I'll likely do such in a future release. This is just to showcase a demo of the instruments, API possibility, and its future application for cool projects :3

14 instruments - with a 15th if Nodecore Bells is enabled (aka I steal their sound file to make another instrument lol).

Currently craftable and unique instrument functional in:
- Mineclonia + VoxeLibre (including redstone wire support)
- Minetest Game
- Exile
- Age of Mending (including wirecutter support)
- Repixture
- Hades Revisited (unique instruments haven't been all tested)

With overall support for Mesecon wiring.

Not craftable in NodeCore - but it does have full instrument support (NodeCore crafting code is too confusing for me as a programmer lol) as well as optics support (though I wasn't really able to test it... As again I'm confused by how optics work lol)

The mod should be compatible with any game - but the list of games I note have been tested. It maintains no hard dependencies - just that you likely won't get crafting or unique instrument support
name: tph_notenode
short_description: Provides musically charged nodes for playing music - unique instruments + options
title: TPH's Notenodes
